tool_description: Calculates base points earned from purchase transactions based on spending amount and product categories.

base_points_per_dollar.description: Standard points earned per dollar spent

error_messages: Invalid transaction_amount: Amount must be a positive number greater than 0.
Empty product_categories: At least one product category must be specified.
Invalid base_points_per_dollar: Must be a positive number between 0.1 and 10.
Unrecognized product_category: All categories must be valid product classification codes.
usage: Provide transaction_amount and product_categories array. Optionally override base_points_per_dollar rate.

base_points.description: Base points earned from this purchase

calculation_details.description: Breakdown of how points were calculated
